verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> Even to day מְרִ֣י <WH4805> bitter שִׂחִ֑י <WH7879> [is] my complaint יָ֝דִ֗י <WH3027> my stroke כָּבְדָ֥ה <WH3513> is heavier עַל־ <WH5921> despite אַנְחָתִֽי׃ <WH585> than my groaning

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Oh that יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> I knew וְאֶמְצָאֵ֑הוּ <WH4672> where I might find אָ֝ב֗וֹא <WH935> him [that] I might come עַד־ <WH5704> against תְּכוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <WH8499> [even] to his seat
אֶעֶרְכָ֣ה <WH6186> I would order לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> before מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> [my] cause וּ֝פִ֗י <WH6310> my mouth אֲמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> him and fill תוֹכָחֽוֹת׃ <WH8433> with arguments

אֵ֭דְעָה <WH3045> I would know מִלִּ֣ים <WH4405> the words יַעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> [which] he would answer וְ֝אָבִ֗ינָה <WH995> me and understand מַה־ <WH4100> what יֹּ֥אמַר <WH559> what he would say לִֽי׃
הַבְּרָב־ <WH7227> in abundance כֹּ֭חַ <WH3581> ability יָרִ֣יב <WH7378> Will he plead עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> against לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אַךְ־ <WH389> surely ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> he יָשִׂ֥ם <WH7760> pay בִּֽי׃

שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> There יָ֭שָׁר <WH3477> There the righteous נוֹכָ֣ח <WH3198> might dispute עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> and I וַאֲפַלְּטָ֥ה <WH6403> with him so should I be delivered לָ֝נֶ֗צַח <WH5331> for ever מִשֹּׁפְטִֽי׃ <WH8199> from my judge

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold קֶ֣דֶם <WH6924> forward אֶהֱלֹ֣ךְ <WH1980> Behold I go וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <WH369> else וְ֝אָח֗וֹר <WH268> but he [is] not [there] and backward וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> cannot אָבִ֥ין <WH995> but I cannot perceive לֽוֹ׃

שְׂמֹ֣אול <WH8040> On the left hand בַּעֲשֹׂת֣וֹ <WH6213> where he doth work וְלֹא־ <WH3808> cannot אָ֑חַז <WH2372> but I cannot behold יַעְטֹ֥ף <WH5848> [him] he hideth יָ֝מִ֗ין <WH3225> himself on the right hand וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot אֶרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> that I cannot see

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָ֭דַע <WH3045> But he knoweth דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the way עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> that I take בְּ֝חָנַ֗נִי <WH974> [when] he hath tried כַּזָּהָ֥ב <WH2091> as gold אֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> me I shall come forth

בַּ֭אֲשֻׁרוֹ <WH838> his steps אָחֲזָ֣ה <WH270> hath held רַגְלִ֑י <WH7272> My foot דַּרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> his way שָׁמַ֣רְתִּי <WH8104> have I kept וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not אָֽט׃ <WH5186> and not declined

מִצְוַ֣ת <WH4687> from the commandment שְׂ֭פָתָיו <WH8193> of his lips וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> have not אָמִ֑ישׁ <WH4185> Neither have I gone back מֵ֝חֻקִּ֗י <WH2706> more than my necessary צָפַ֥נְתִּי <WH6845> I have esteemed אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> the words פִֽיו׃ <WH6310> of his mouth

וְה֣וּא <WH1931> He בְ֭אֶחָד <WH259> But he [is] in one וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and who יְשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> [mind] and who can turn וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> him? and [what] his soul אִוְּתָ֣ה <WH183> desireth וַיָּֽעַשׂ׃ <WH6213> even [that] he doeth
כִּ֭י <WH3588> for יַשְׁלִ֣ים <WH7999> For he performeth חֻקִּ֑י <WH2706> [the thing that is] appointed וְכָהֵ֖נָּה <WH2007> such רַבּ֣וֹת <WH7227> for me and many עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֭ן <WH3651> at מִפָּנָ֣יו <WH6440> at his presence אֶבָּהֵ֑ל <WH926> Therefore am I troubled אֶ֝תְבּוֹנֵ֗ן <WH995> when I consider וְאֶפְחַ֥ד <WH6342> I am afraid מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at
וְ֭אֵל <WH410> For God הֵרַ֣ךְ <WH7401> soft לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> maketh my heart וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <WH7706> and the Almighty הִבְהִילָֽנִי׃ <WH926> troubleth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor נִ֭צְמַתִּי <WH6789> Because I was not cut off מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> before חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <WH2822> the darkness וּ֝מִפָּנַ֗י <WH6440> from my face כִּסָּה־ <WH3680> [neither] hath he covered אֹֽפֶל׃ <WH652> the darkness
